translations.text: We sent it<sup foot_note="81486">1</sup>down on the Night of Determination.
But what can make yousg realize what the Night of Determination is?
The Night of Determination is better than a thousand months—
in it descend the angels, with the Spirit<sup foot_note="81487">1</sup>among them, by the leave of their Lord with every command.
Peace! It is until the rise1 of dawn.
